data:
1. Increase user engagement and satisfaction by 25% through the development of a user-friendly interface, incorporating features such as chat for resolving doubts, personalized training, and a learning results dashboard. This will be achieved by implementing UI/UX best practices, using tools such as Figma and React, and continuously gathering and incorporating user feedback.
2. Improve training quality and compliance rates by 20% through the use of AI-powered content generation, complementing content with verified sources, and evaluating learning outcomes. This will be achieved by utilizing GPT and other AI technologies, as well as implementing regular assessments and reporting functionalities.
3. Enhance the visibility and adoption of PREVENT-IA by reducing energy consumption and addressing concerns around AI use regulations. This will be achieved by implementing scalable and efficient architecture, such as AWS, Cloud Computing, and Autoscaling Groups, and staying up-to-date on industry regulations and best practices. Additionally, efforts will be made to increase visibility on social media and improve public opinion on the use of AI through targeted marketing and communication strategies.
